title: Population in the largest city (% of urban population)
name: en.urb.lcty.ur.zs
readme: Population in largest city is the percentage of a countrys urban population living in that countrys largest metropolitan area.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Population in largest city is the percentage of a countrys urban population living in that countrys largest metropolitan area.
